subcategories.title: Low-cost, Durable Construction Methods
subcategories.description: Learn how to build safe, long-lasting structures using simple tools and affordable materials. Ideal for creating strong shelters in resource-limited areas.

subcategories.title: Locally Available Materials
subcategories.description: Find out how to identify and use materials from your immediate surroundings—like earth, bamboo, or recycled materials—to lower costs and support sustainability.

subcategories.title: Purification
subcategories.description: Use household items or low-cost filters to make water safe for drinking. Includes simple boiling, sand filtering, and solar disinfection techniques.

subcategories.title: Desalination
subcategories.description: Build small-scale systems to turn salty or brackish water into fresh water using heat and condensation. Great for coastal or saline-prone areas.

subcategories.title: Efficient Distribution
subcategories.description: Design and improve gravity-fed or pump-based systems to distribute water evenly and reduce waste. Tips include pipe layout, storage tanks, and elevation tricks.

subcategories.title: DIY Solar Energy
subcategories.description: Set up your own solar panel systems for basic lighting and device charging. Covers solar panel positioning, batteries, and wiring safety.

subcategories.title: Biogas Generation
subcategories.description: Turn kitchen and animal waste into clean-burning gas for cooking. Learn how to build a small digester, maintain it, and safely use the gas.

subcategories.title: Microgrids for Sustainable Power
subcategories.description: Build small, local power systems that connect solar, wind, or battery energy to homes and clinics. Learn how to balance loads and increase energy access.

subcategories.title: EMT Skills
subcategories.description: Learn lifesaving basics such as CPR, wound dressing, splinting, and how to assess an emergency before help arrives.

subcategories.title: Telemedicine
subcategories.description: Use phones and simple apps to connect with doctors remotely. Learn how to explain symptoms, send photos, and follow up with online care.

subcategories.title: First Aid
subcategories.description: Master everyday skills for cuts, burns, insect bites, and fevers. Helps reduce complications when access to a clinic is delayed.

subcategories.title: Self-sufficient Healthcare
subcategories.description: Set up a basic first aid station at home or in your village. Includes herbal remedies, rehydration recipes, and supply checklists.

subcategories.title: Urban Gardening
subcategories.description: Grow healthy vegetables in small spaces using buckets, rooftops, or window boxes. Learn how to compost and plant in cycles.

subcategories.title: Hydroponics
subcategories.description: Use water-based growing systems to raise food without soil. Learn to mix nutrient solutions and maintain pH for healthy crops.

subcategories.title: Sustainable Agriculture Techniques
subcategories.description: Practice crop rotation, natural pest control, and cover cropping to improve soil health and increase yields without chemicals.
